data.title: Online music streaming platform
data.meta_description: The power of music. 120 million tracks, new music, exclusive features, on iOS and Android. Discover now
data.text:
Deezer is a music streaming app that gives you access to over 120 million tracks worldwide and other audio content like podcasts. You even get curated recommendations and Deezer Originals exclusives.

Listen to music online, collect your favourites, create playlists, and share with friends, all for free.

You can also download all your favourite music and listen offline with Deezer Premium, Deezer Family and other plans.

Deezer Free offers a completely free music app experience. If you choose one of our paying music streaming offers, you can enjoy our advanced features for as little as 11,99 â‚¬/month. Terms apply.

Download the app on your phone, tablet or desktop, then sign up for free. Once you've logged into your new account, you can stream your favourite music!

Deezer is supported on desktop and most mobile and tablet devices. It's also possible to stream and cast from select home and speaker devices. You can find all devices here.

For users with a paying subscription, you can listen to music wherever you go by downloading your favourite songs and playlists.
